text: The Hyundai Intrado is a mini SUV concept car made by Korean company Hyundai. It is powered by a hydrogen fuel cell powertrain with a 36-kWH Lithium-ion battery. It has a range of about on a single fill up. ==See also== *Hyundai Tucson(ix35) FCEV *Hyundai Nexo ==References== Category:Hydrogen cars Category:Fuel cell vehicles Intrado
title: Hyundai Intrado
